title: Divinity Original Sin ( 1.0.74 To 1.0.107 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for "Divinity Orginal Sin". This patch is only for the gog version of the game. Please note, If your game version is on the 1.0.81 Patch. You will encounter an error while installing this patch. That is ok. Once you encounter that error, start up the game and check the main menu to see if the game version is updated. Also the latest version of the level editor is included. Mac users, gog has not updated the patch for you guys yet so you have to wait a little longer. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


---------------------
